CANADA.Description: Lethbridge College offers the Nursing - After Degree Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN) program, providing a pathway for experienced nurses to further their education.

CANADA.Programs: Music Education as a Second Degree
CANADA.Description: The Bachelor of Music Education as a Second Degree at Memorial University of Newfoundland is a 45 credit hour professional program designed to prepare kindergarten to grade 12 music teachers in all facets of school music education: foundations of music education; primary/elementary and intermediate/secondary classroom music; and choral and instrumental music education.

If you are interested in pursuing a career in education, the Concurrent Education program from Ontario Tech University allows you to apply directly for advanced acceptance into a Consecutive Education program.
Thompson Rivers University offers a degree in Bachelor of Arts for students interested in a variety of study options.
Thompson Rivers University offers a degree in Bachelor of Arts (Online) for students interested in a variety of study options.

Within the Medical Physics (Hons) program from Toronto Metropolitan University, you’ll learn to apply physics-based concepts and methodologies to procedures such as medical imaging, radiation therapy, radiation protection and dosimetry.

This Biology (Hons) BSc program from Toronto Metropolitan University teaches concepts spanning from cellular structure and function to the environment and bioinformatics, integrating studies in chemistry, computers and management.

In this Bachelor of Arts in Business Communication (BA) from University Canada West you will develop the critical thinking and team building skills necessary for effective communication in a globally based business setting.

In this Bachelor of Commerce (BCom) program from the University Canada West you will develop the critical thinking and team building skills necessary for effective communication in a globally based business setting.
The study of the Interdisciplinary Linguistics program at University of Winnipeg considers the relationship between language, culture and communication.
The Mennonite Studies program from University of Winnipeg gives you an opportunity to study the rich heritage of the Mennonites and their contribution to society.

Studying the Sociology program at University of Winnipeg can help you to develop a “sociological imagination” which is a quality of mind that gives us the ability to understand our own personal experiences as they are shaped by the society in which we live.
At the Western University - Canada, we offer our students a bachelor degree in Medical Biophysics and Biochemistry.

The international Master / Full-time / Online, On Campus, Blended Architectural Technology program from Centennial College prepares students for a career in an international environment in Toronto, Canada.

The international Postgraduate Certificate / Full-time, Part-time / On Campus Marketing and Entrepreneurship program from Trent University prepares students for a career in an international environment in Peterborough, Canada.

The international LL.M. / Full-time, Part-time / Online, On Campus Canadian Common Law program from York University - Osgoode Hall Law School prepares students for a career in an international environment in Toronto, Canada.
